Message:
My body, having lost its rust,
was being held together
by my power as a witch.

A witch’s power comes
from the heart.
For a puppet like me
to gain such power...

“Professor. D.D.
Would you like to
research stars with me?”

Before, I had made a promise
with the professor
to go see the sky.

I still remember my excitement
from that day.

The three of us headed
to the library and researched
all we could about shooting stars.

D.D. looked up the optimal times
and places to view stars,
while I took notes about
their changing light and colors.

All the while,
the professor drew up
sketches of shooting stars.

“If you wish upon a shooting star,
your wish will come true,
you know?”

The professor told me so.
I added what she said to my notes,
and with that,
our observation journal
was complete.

“Why can’t it be
next month already?” said D.D.
It seemed even my sister
couldn’t contain her “enthusiasm.”

Even I caught myself
smiling in anticipation.
